H3.text: What country became democratic after the death of Generalísimo Franco. SPAIN

A4.text: The Spanish transition to democracy or new Bourbon restoration started with Franco's death on 20 November 1975

A5.text: Under its current (1978) constitution, Spain is a constitutional monarchy
